item.title: Night Parade
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: Team Members: Wesley Yuen Tristan Crane Demi Montes Christopher Tang Haruka Masuda Richard Miao Joey Shi Description: Follow Yuko as she travels into the Yokai Realm, a dark world mirroring our own, solves puzzles, uncovers the truth, and in an attempt to save her sister. … Continue readingNight Parade
item.content:encoded:
Team Members:
Wesley Yuen
Tristan Crane
Demi Montes
Christopher Tang
Haruka Masuda
Richard Miao
Joey Shi

Description:
Follow Yuko as she travels into the Yokai Realm, a dark world mirroring our own, solves puzzles, uncovers the truth, and in an attempt to save her sister.


PLAY HERE

item.title: Klaymation
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: Team Members: Christopher Kevin Jonathan Brandon Chan Nathan Poon Ben Spratt Theodore Pellegrin Jay Ho Brian Ackermann Alex Mountain Description: A 2D arcade game inspired by Tetris and Donkey Kong. There was once a wizard who loves to create clay during his free time. One … Continue readingKlaymation
item.content:encoded:
Team Members:
Christopher Kevin Jonathan
Brandon Chan
Nathan Poon
Ben Spratt
Theodore Pellegrin
Jay Ho
Brian Ackermann
Alex Mountain

Description:
A 2D arcade game inspired by Tetris and Donkey Kong. There was once a wizard who loves to create clay during his free time. One random day, his magic has gone wrong. The clay has come to life and they are trying to kill you! Use blocks to prevent them from getting near you. Clear the lines to make more space for yourself.


PLAY HERE

item.title: Swordship By Team Swordship
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: Description: Swordship is a 2D physics based fighting game where you fly spaceships that wield giant weapons. Strike your opponents with swords, skewer them with spears or blast them from afar with cannons in this action packed brawler! PLAY HERE
item.content:encoded:
Description:
Swordship is a 2D physics based fighting game where you fly spaceships that wield giant weapons.
Strike your opponents with swords, skewer them with spears or blast them from afar with cannons in this action packed brawler!

PLAY HERE
